Extract the file name and file type of data in the local path

extract_filename_filetype.Rd

This is a helper function used in the wrapper function to load local data (can be extended later to work with postgres).

Usage

extract_filename_filetype(data_name, file_path)

Arguments

data_name

The name of the data of interest (needs to be in the way provided here in the file name)

file_path

The local path where the data is saved.

Value

A list in the form of a dictionary that contains "filename" and "filetype". Can be used as inputs for elsar_load_data().
